articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing hosted a reception on Jan. 7 on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Present there on invitation were Sun Jiazheng, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, Liu Hongcai, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the assistant to the foreign minister of China and other officials concerned.
					
					 On hand were Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, and his embassy officials.
					
					 Addressing the reception, Choe said that the Korean people are rejoiced over the fact that the Chinese people achieved economic development and grandly celebrated the 60th founding anniversary of the People's Republic of China last year, and sincerely wished them greater victory in the new year.
					
					 It is the consistent policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to steadily consolidate and develop the traditional DPRK-China friendship, he said, expressing belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would develop in line with the common desire and interests of the two peoples in the new year, too.
					
					 Sun Jiazheng said that the Korean people made rich achievements in building a great prosperous and powerful nation in the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude under the leadership of the WPK headed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il. The Chinese people are rejoiced over this and heartily wish the Korean people greater success in the new year, he added.
					
					 It is the unshakable policy of the Chinese party and government to steadily develop the China-DPRK relations of good-neighborly friendship and cooperation, he said, declaring that they would continue to boost exchange and cooperation together with the Korean comrades in various fields in the new year in the spirit of "Inheriting tradition, facing up to the future, building good-neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation" and thus open up more beautiful chapter of China-DPRK friendship.

articles.title: Gift from Japanese Botanist
articles.content:
Gift from Japanese Botanist
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with rare plants as a gift by Mototeru Kamo, prominent Japanese botanist and famous horticulturist, on the occasions of the New Year and the February holiday.
					 The plants belong to Begonia hiemalis cv. and Bougainvillea spectabilis cv.
					
					  Begonia hiemalis, succulent grass plant, has a straight stalk and is crisscrossed with round leaves.
					
					 This beautiful plant has five or six flowers and comes into bloom in various colors, red, yellow and white according to its species.
					
					 The Bougainvillea spectabilis belongs to the family of four-o'clock and is evergreen as half vinery. What is peculiar is that a yellow flower is covered with three floral bracts which look like flower leaves.
					
					 The floral bracts have the shape of eggs about 2.5 cm in length and have diverse colors, pink, purple and white according to species.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was presented with such rare plants as Nelumbo nucifera cv. Makotobasu and others by Mototeru Kamo in the past.

articles.title: Korean People's Belief in Cause of Socialism
articles.content:
Korean People's Belief in Cause of Socialism
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Eighteen years has elapsed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il issued a famous work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party" in January 1992.
					The work clearly indicates the way of accomplishing the cause of socialism and proves the invincibility of Korean socialism centred on the masses in a scientific manner.
					
					 All the ideas and theories expounded in the work including the issues of consolidating the main force of the revolution, enhancing its role and adhering to the fundamental principles of socialism in the revolution and construction serve as a banner of inspiring the people with faith in and optimism about the victorious cause of socialism.
					
					 Since the publication of the work, the Korean people have dynamically advanced forward, believing that the cause of socialism will emerge victorious under Kim Jong Il's great revolutionary leadership based on Songun.
					
					 It is thanks to his wise leadership that they steadfastly defended socialism through the "Arduous March", the forced march, and laid a solid foundation for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Now they are confident of the invincibility of Korean socialism and its bright future, fully displaying its ever-victorious might on the strength of his faith in independence and will to achieve it.
					
					 The successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2, the attainment of the cutting edge of the CNC technology, the establishment of the Juche-based steel-making system and other successes made in last year's efforts for a great upsurge strikingly demonstrate that there is no unconquerable fortress for the Korean people with an indomitable faith in socialism.
					
					 They, convinced of the justness and future of socialism, their own choice, will vigorously advance toward the building of a thriving nation under the veteran and sagacious leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Development of Light Industry and Agriculture Urged
articles.content:
Development of Light Industry and Agriculture Urged
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday carries an editorial appealing to all the Korean people to accelerate once again the development of light industry and agriculture in the flames of the great revolutionary surge and make an all-out charge in response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 To bring about a radical turn in improving the people's standard of living by giving spurs to the development of light industry and agriculture is a worthwhile work to translate into reality the Party's noble intention to enable the Korean people to live as well as others, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The present sweeping campaign to bring about a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture is sure to emerge victorious.
					
					 When we give full play to the productive potentials already built by holding on to the Party's policies of light industrial and agricultural revolution, a great turn will be brought about in improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 An all-Party and nationwide efforts should be concentrated on the drive for putting spurs to the development of light industry and agriculture once again.
					
					 We should concentrate all our efforts on decisively boosting the light industry and agriculture, deeply mindful that to improve the people's standard of living is not a mere economic and technical work but an important political work to demonstrate the justness of the WPK's cause of implementing the behests of President Kim Il Sung and translating into reality all ideals of the people.

articles.title: Japan's Moves for Nuclear Weaponization Slashed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves for Nuclear Weaponization Slashed
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, a confidential document on nuclear weapons agreed upon between Japan and the United States in 1969 was discovered in the house of Sato, former prime minister of Japan. 
					 The document says that "in crucial contingency" the U.S. shall have a "prior consultation" with Japan and introduce nuclear weapons into Okinawa or its warships with nuclear weapons aboard shall have the right to have transit through Okinawa for the "defense of the Far East" including Japan and it shall promptly respond to any U.S. request. It is also stipulated in the document that the U.S. shall be allowed to use the nuclear arsenal, etc. in Okinawa any time even after its return to Japan.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed commentary observes in this regard: The recently disclosed confidential document lays bare the black-hearted true colors of Japanese reactionaries playing a double game, seized with brazen-faced ambition for overseas expansion. This once again clearly testifies to the hypocrisy of the "three non-nuclear principles" touted by them.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have stepped up their moves for nuclear weaponization behind the smokescreen of the "three non-nuclear principles," the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Japan made a number of secret nuclear promises with the U.S. in the past under the disguise of the so-called "prior consultation." These facts were brought to light through various channels but Japan has persistently denied them. 
					
					 Japan is the only country that has desperately worked to go nuclear with an eye to invade other countries, advocating the above-said principles.
					
					 Japan is seeking a war, not peace, and leaving no means untried to realize its scenario for reinvasion. 
					
					 The above-mentioned moves of Japan for nuclear weaponization are as foolish as precipitating its self-destruction.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to drop their nuclear ambition, bearing this deep in mind.

articles.title: S. Koreas' War Exercises Assailed
articles.content:
S. Koreas' War Exercises Assailed
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The first field army of the south Korean puppet ground force staged the so-called "exercises for coping with infiltration and provocation of a local war" with the mobilization of all its personnel at the dawn of the New Year's day under the pretext of fending off "enemy intrusions" to be made "simultaneously" on land and along the coast. Earlier, the third fleet of the Navy of the puppet army kicked off a fuss, detecting, tracking and seizing ships secretly entering Pusan Port in a coordinated operation with "the maritime police agency on the southern coast."
					 Commenting on this, a news analyst of Minju Joson Saturday observes:
					
					 It is a development which should not be overlooked that the south Korean warlike forces vied with each other to stage war exercises on the ground and along the coast at the end of last year and the beginning of the new year.
					
					 All the Koreans are exposed to the constant danger of war and the north-south relations are going from bad to worse due to such traitors who are working with blood-shot eyes to hurt fellow countrymen while kowtowing to the U.S. 
					
					 The south Korean warmongers are hell-bent on the moves to further strain the north-south relations and ignite a war against the DPRK. But their confrontation with fellow countrymen will only lead them to destruction.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK hope for national reconciliation and unity and the improved inter-Korean relations but they will never show any mercy to the warmongers who incite confrontation while defiling even the dignified system in the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers had better behave themselves, bearing this in mind.

articles.title: National Reconciliation and Cooperation Called for
articles.content:
National Reconciliation and Cooperation Called for
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- National reconciliation and cooperation are prerequisites to national reunification and priority tasks, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 Any Korean who loves the country and the nation and desires reunification should put forward national reconciliation and cooperation as a common goal of struggle and orient and subordinate everything to attaining it, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is necessary to place the common interests of the nation above all other things and achieve reconciliation and unity on their basis.
					
					 Whoever truly wishes to see the inter-Korean relations improved should drop the narrow-minded concept of confrontation, get rid of the narrow framework of ism of individuals and partisan interests and strategy and prioritize and protect the interests of the nation.
					
					 In order to subordinate everything to the interests common to the nation it is essential to remain true to the idea of "By our nation itself." 
					
					 All compatriots should support and encourage everything beneficial to reconciliation and cooperation through visits and contacts free from prejudice and pool will and efforts for achieving the common objective of the nation.
					
					 What is urgent for meeting common interests and prosperity of the nation through reconciliation and cooperation is to have all legal and institutional mechanisms obstructive to them dismantled. 
					
					 All Koreans should put an end to all legal and institutional mechanisms doing harm to the development of the inter-Korean relations and reunification through firm solidarity and a dynamic struggle.
					
					 The movement for the country's reunification is a nationwide patriotic cause.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire and unwavering will of the members of the nation to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity through national reconciliation and cooperation.

articles.title: S. Koreas' Projected Field Mobile Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
S. Koreas' Projected Field Mobile Exercises under Fire
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The 26th motorized infantry division of the puppet army announced on Jan. 7 that it would stage field mobile exercises in the areas of the cities of Yangju and Tongduchon, Kyonggi Province from Jan. 11 to 15, according to the south Korean Yonhap News. 
					 The bellicose forces said that they would fire blank shells day and night by massively mobilizing arms and equipment including tanks and armed forces.
					
					 The madcap saber rattling for a preemptive attack on the DPRK projected by the puppet warmongers from the outset of the year is driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a worse crisis.

articles.title: Media Man Arrested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Media Man Arrested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police on Jan. 6 arrested Kwon Ho Yong, a media man of the "Socialist Workers Newspaper", on the charge of the violation of the notorious "Security Law".
					 That day policemen in plain clothes belonging to the "Security Investigation Group" of the puppet National Police Agency broke into his office in Yongdungpho, Seoul, and arrested him before taking him to its "anti-communist section".
					
					 The fascist police resorted to such repressive actions in October last year as forcibly searching his office and house and issuing summons to appear at the police station. They perpetrated the recent tyrannical action against him when he came out in protest against the police suppression, laying bare the injustice of the NSL.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Finnish Organization
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Finnish Organization
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Finland-Korea Society issued a statement on Jan. 3 in support of the joint New Year editorial published by the newspapers of the party, the army and the youth of the DPRK.
					The statement said the editorial fully reflects the faith and will of the Korean people to bring about a new revolutionary turn in the socialist economic construction in 2010 under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The statement expressed belief that the Korean people would bring about a sweeping revolutionary turn in the overall economic sectors including light industry and agriculture this year under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and thus open the gate to a thriving socialist nation in 2012 without fail.
					
					 The statement expressed solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country by their own efforts free from foreign interference, demanding the U.S. imperialists roll back their hostile policy towards the DPRK and withdraw their forces from south Korea at once.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Supported in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions on the joint New Year editorial of the newspapers of the party, the army and the youth of the DPRK titled "Bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea" were held in India and Pakistan on Jan. 3 and 4.
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 B. C. Gupta, chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Delhi of India, gave a detailed account of the joint New Year editorial, expressing belief that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in their work for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country in this significant year.
					
					 Akrak Aktar Hamidi, chairman of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, said that the DPRK has safeguarded socialism and dynamically advanced along the road of building a thriving nation because General Secretary Kim Jong Il has wisely led the Korean people with the original Songun politics.
					
					 Mohammad Aslam Nagi, secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, reiterated full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for the reunification of the country, adding that the DPRK is the only country in the world which is waging a resolute struggle against the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Embajada coreana en China ofrece banquete por el Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Embajada coreana en China ofrece banquete por el Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo 99 (2010) de la Era Juche, la embajada coreana en China ofrecio el dia 7 un banquete.
					 A la recepcion fueron invitados el vicepresidente del Comite Nacional de la Conferencia Consultiva Politica del Pueblo Chino (CCPPCh) Sun Jiazheng, el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad China-Corea Wu Donghe, el subjefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China (PCCh) Liu Hongcai, el ministro asistente de Relaciones Exteriores y otros funcionarios chinos.
					
					 Tambien estuvieron presentes el embajador Choe Jin Su y otros miembros de la embajada coreana en China.
					
					 Choe, en su discurso, dijo que el pueblo coreano se regocija de que en el ano pasado el pueblo chino haya alcanzado el desarrollo economico y celebrado solemnemente el 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular China y le desea  sinceramente la mayor victoria en el Ano Nuevo.
					
					 Prosiguio que consolidar y desarrollar sin cesar la tradicional amistad Corea-China es la invariable orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y expreso su conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran tambien en el ano nuevo conforme al deseo e interes comunes de los pueblos de los dos paises.
					
					 Sun Jiazheng, en su discurso, subrayo que bajo la direccion del PTC encabezado por el Secretario General Kim Jong Il, el pueblo coreano logro los exitos abundantes en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera al apoyarse en sus propias fuerzas y luchar  tenazmente y anadio que el pueblo chino se alegra al respecto y desea de todo corazon al pueblo coreano mayores exitos tambien en el ano nuevo.
					
					 Senalando que la consolidacion y el desarrollo constantes de las relaciones de buena vecindad, amistad y cooperacion China-Corea es la orientacion inconmovible del partido y el gobierno de China, destaco que en el ano nuevo abrira la pagina mas hermosa de las relaciones de amistad China-Corea al profundizar continuamente junto con los camaradas coreanos el intercambio y la cooperacion en varias esferas conforme al espiritu de "la herencia de la tradicion, la aspiracion al futuro, la buena vecindad, la amistad y el fortalecimiento de cooperacion".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a la ofensiva general de este ano
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a la ofensiva general de este ano
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ATCC) -- Todos deben lanzar una ofensiva general dando otro acicate a la industria ligera y la agricultura al promover con mas fuerza el gran auge revolucionario en respuesta al llamamiento del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un editorial difundido este sabado y continua:
					
					Imprimir un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo dando espuelas a la industria ligera y la agricultura es una labor digna para realizar el noble proposito del partido de hacer vivir al pueblo coreano sin envidiar nada a nadie.
					
					La ofensiva general de hoy para ese fin es una lucha con seguras posibilidades de victoria.
					
					Cuando el pueblo coreano utilice al maximo las potencialidades de produccion ya consolidadas acatando la orientacion del partido de producir una revolucion en la industria ligera y en la agricultura, acontecera una gran revolucion en la vida del pueblo.
					
					Hay que concentrar los esfuerzos de todo el partido y el Estado a la lucha por dar otro acicate a dichas ramas.
					
					Todos los coreanos deben hacer ingentes esfuerzos por desarrollar decisivamente la industria ligera y la agricultura dandose clara cuenta de que mejorar la vida del pueblo no es una simple gestion economica sino una labor politica importante, que corrobora la justeza de la causa del partido por llevar a la realidad el legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung y todos los ideales del pueblo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica documento nuclear Japon-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica documento nuclear Japon-EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ATCC) -- Hace poco, en la casa del ex premier japones Sato quedo descubierto un documento nuclear absolutamente secreto sobre el acuerdo alcanzado en 1969 entre Japon y Estados Unidos.
					Segun el, mediante "debate previo" con Japon, EE.UU. tendra el derecho a introducir en Okinawa los armamentos nucleares o pasar por esta isla los buques de sus tropas cargados de los mismos artefactos para defender el "Extremo Oriente", incluso a Japon, cuando se de una "importante situacion de emergencia".
					
					Ademas, Japon debe aceptar inmediatamente las demandas en ese sentido de EE.UU.
					
					En otra parte del documento, se ha establecido que  EE.UU. puede usar en cualquier momento su deposito de armas nucleares en Okinawa aun despues de que devolviera esta isla a la parte japonesa.
					
					Este documento revela con toda claridad la sucia naturaleza de los reaccionarios japoneses que se portan con dos caras abrigando su cinica ambicion expansionista a ultramar.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido el dia 9 y continua:
					
					Igualmente, vuelve a corroborar el caracter fraudulento y enganoso de los "tres principios de desnuclearizacion" de que hablan tanto ellos.
					
					Detras de la cortina de esos principios superficiales, los reaccionarios islenos vinieron dando acicate a su armamentismo nuclear.
					
					En el pasado, Japon contrajo en varias ocasiones los compromisos secretos nucleares con EE.UU. bajo el rotulo del supuesto "debate previo".
					
					Aunque quedo revelado este hecho por diferentes vias, Japon lo ha negado siempre.
					
					En este mundo no hay otro pais como Japon que acelera desesperadamente el armamentismo nuclear para agredir a otros paises preconizando los "tres principios de desnuclearizacion".
					
					Japon no persigue la paz sino la guerra ni repara en los medios y metodos para alcanzar su meta de retomar el camino de agresion.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben desistir de su ambicion nuclear dandose clara cuenta de que el armamentismo nuclear disfrazado de los tres principios mencionados les conducira a la autodestruccion.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia a los belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia a los belicistas surcoreanos 
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ATCC) -- A la madrugada del primero de enero de este ano, el primer ejercito en campana de las fuerzas terrestres titeres del Sur de Corea libro con la participacion de todos sus efectivos el llamado "ejercicio frente a la infiltracion y la provocacion local limitada", bajo el pretexto de bloquear la "infiltracion de enemigos", que supuestamente se comete con "caracter simultaneo" en el interior del territorio y en las zonas costeras. 
					Con anterioridad, la 3a flota de las fuerzas navales titeres se entrego, en colaboracion con la "agencia de la policia maritima del Mar Sur", a la busqueda, persecucion y detencion de un barco que se infiltraba en el puerto de Pusan. 
					
					 En un comentario individual difundido el dia 9, el rotativo Minju Joson insistio en que constituyen una situacion imposible de pasar por alto esos ejercicios de guerra que los belicistas surcoreanos libraron como competencia en la tierra y en las costas a finales del ano pasado y a principios del presente. 
					
					 Debido a esos traidores a la nacion que obedecen a EE.UU. como a su abuelo e intentan pelear con los connacionales rechinando los dientes, toda la nacion coreana no se libra del permanente peligro de guerra y las relaciones intercoreanas se empeoran de dia en dia, revela el comentarista.
					
					Como se ve, los belicistas surcoreanos estan desesperados por empeorar las relaciones Norte-Sur y desatar la guerra de agresion al Norte, apunta y prosigue que lo unico que sacaran ellos de la confrontacion fratricida es el arruinamiento de si mismos.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC desean la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, pero, nunca se mostraran indulgentes y benevolentes ante los belicistas que libran la campana de confrontacion calumniando el muy digno regimen de la RPDC, reitera.
					
					Teniendolo presente, los belicistas surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia, concluye el rotativo.
